players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Diana was found dead.
Bob: "I'm innocent, I swear. I didn't kill anyone."
Charlie: "I'm going to investigate Alice, she's suspicious. I think she might be the mafioso."
You: " I'm not suspicious, I just have a lot of questions. Why did Charlie investigate me and what evidence does he have?"
